Highly recommended, with an affordable price for snorkeling, you can enjoy viewing sardines run and sea turtles.

Swim maybe 30 meters out in the sea and you can see thousands of sardines. If you are lucky there are also turtles. For a beach to tan and relax go to white beach, this is more to swim. Many shops/restaurants around as well

The place in Moalboal with so many beautiful dive sites. I hope that they recover very soon after the typhoon so that I can appreciate their beauty more on my future dives.

Surreal experience to swim with the sardines and sea green turtle.

Our jump off point is at Hungry Monkeys which is quite convenient to Sardines and if you are lucky enough you get to swim with sea green turtle/s.

Fun activities include snorkeling and swimming with the sardines are both fulfilling and adventurous and discovering how beautiful these creatures under sea level in a clear sea water and white sand beach.
